title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 06 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 06 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts on Thursday. Why Rush received the Presidential Medal of Freedom. Mitt Romney questions Trump, but not Obama. Live coverage of Trump’s statement on acquittal. Romney isn’t a political leader. Is an attack with the 25th Amendment next? Independents approve of Trump’s “reality TV’ State of the Union address. Romney cheated in Utah.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Experiencing the America Trump sees. Mitt Romney is the political equivalent of water. Do it for Rush: Don’t take this election for granted, go vote. The normalization of pedophilia by the sexual left. When will Hillary Clinton and the Democrats be held accountable? Acquittals and elections have consequences. Trump should send signed copies of WaPo to Romney.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

What are Romney’s leadership priorities? Time to hold D.C. and Big Tech accountable. Twitter suspends James O’Keefe for journalism. Imagine an actual investigation into Biden, Inc. and Clinton cash. Send a Trump intern to Utah to take Romney’s spot. Does Twitter have editorial oversight of content? Rush shows the importance of freedom of speech. Inserting chaos is never good, it’s always a power grab.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
